message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to stay within my budget.
